message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I'm excited to discuss the price with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $1050000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to both of us.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product for $1025000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to both of us.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make one more offer and propose $975000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $975000. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product for $1075000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to both of us.
